```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(metafor)
```

```{r , include=FALSE}
dat_rich <- read_csv(here("Gardner_et_al_data-KAR35vs02_onlyprimates_nospaces.csv"))
```

```{r}
dat_rich_2 <- dat_rich %>% 
  dplyr::mutate(
    UMD = MeanvalueatLowFauna - MeanvalueatHighFauna,
    s_within = sqrt(
      ((HighFaunaN - 1) * (SDatHighFauna ^ 2) + (LowFaunaN - 1) * (SDatLowFauna ^ 2) ) 
      /
      (HighFaunaN - 1 + LowFaunaN - 1)),
    UMD_SE = s_within * sqrt((1/HighFaunaN) + (1 / LowFaunaN)))
```
